headline: Universal Health Services (UHS) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: What is moving Universal Health Services today? Universal Health Services (UHS) is drawing attention after recent trading that left the stock with a one-month return of about an 11% decline and a past three-month return of roughly an 8% decline. See our latest analysis for Universal Health Services. At around US$200.13, the recent 1 month share price return of an 11% decline and the year to date share price return of an 8.98% decline sit against a 1 year total shareholder return of 6.16%...
